Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are ranting about issues that include upcoming budget projection and tax cuts. Welfare relief and rental crisis are also discussed; as well as the inability of health promotion to illustrate their worth accurately. Some tweets direct their angst toward political figures and their policies. Others ruminate on the power and implications of seemingly dire economic decisions. These posts reflect the tensions and anxieties experienced by people impacted differently by economic policies.
